info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 1:50PM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 6000 feet. Snow showers will increase through the afternoon and evening, becoming steady overnight. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph, leading to reduced visibility in areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Dilkon and Shonto. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute, as well as any New Year`s Eve travel plans. Additional snow forecast from 1 PM Today to 11 AM Saturday: Dilkon 1 to 3 inches Shonto 1 to 3 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
